author: swhitenstall
title: Catalyst Audit Circle
description: Catalyst lacks a governing circle whose focus is on problem sensing prioritisation of problems surrounding auditing for funded proposals.

author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Auditor DAO
description: Making the audit process efficient distributed and transparent requires sustained funding however Catalyst funding is for specific projects.

author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: Funded Proposer Experience
description: With exponential volume of proposals and proposers, auditing projects becomes unscalable if conducted manually.

author: pace
title: Progress and KPI reporting tool
description: The current auditing process is not community owned and managed, full reporting data is not easily available

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: Project Audits by Challenge Teams
description: How can we audit funded projects after finalization?

author: swhitenstall
title: Community Governance Oversight
description: Without oversight we risk stagnation and we lack accountability in our governance.

author: raz
title: Impact Measurements Tool - research
description: A key challenge to track project progress + effectiveness are clear impact measurements, especially for Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game development update podcast
description: Discovery for CNFT games is fragmented and tracking meaningful progress in Discord is messy.

author: profd2004
title: Translation for Proposal API DATA
description: We're building an API to easy query and audit all of catalyst proposal data and metrics that will only be available in English.

author: joey.chessher
title: Elevated Project Management Process
description: As the number of funded projects grow it becomes more difficult to Audit their progress and Monitor their impact using the existing process.

author: geekship
title: SOIL: Auditable E-Commerce
description: Governments and E-Commerce providers need to agree on how to perform audits.

author: jeffghome2020
title: Financial Audit Taskforce
description: There is currently no financial audit being performed on funded proposals. We want to ensure funds are spent according to budgets as voted.

author: jondorn12
title: Schedule Standard Audit Template
description: Audits need to completed, but there are too many roadblocks to you get them done..

author: twomin
title: 2MIN REVIEW Integrated Platform
description: Voters need an integrated platform for accessing Catalyst's contents which are filtered, analyzed by 2Min Review.

author: megan.dit
title: Auditability through film and media
description: There is no simple process for the community to follow funded proposals that offer complete comprehensive oversight and follow up.

author: busssard
title: A portal to audit and release funds
description: There is no platform to audit projects in an easy way while seeing what stage of the proposal they are in. Lets make it simple and fair!
